trans-unit.source: This class identifies properties, not the values of properties.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe identifica le proprietà, non i valori delle proprietà.

trans-unit.source: Static objects of this type are found as fields of <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> and control pattern classes.
trans-unit.target: Oggetti statici di questo tipo sono presenti come campi di <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>e classi pattern di controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperty"></xref> that encapsulates a specified numerical identifier.
trans-unit.target: Recupera un <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperty"> </xref> che incapsula un identificatore numerico specificato.

trans-unit.source: Normally, properties are identified by an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperty> object.
trans-unit.target: In genere, le proprietà vengono identificate da un <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperty>oggetto.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperty>

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to create such an object when only the numerical identifier (the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationIdentifier.Id%2A> inherited from <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationIdentifier>) is known.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo può essere utilizzato per creare tale oggetto quando solo l'identificatore numerico (il <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationIdentifier.Id%2A>ereditato da <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationIdentifier>) è noto.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationIdentifier> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationIdentifier.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperty"></xref> that encapsulates a specified numerical identifier.
trans-unit.target: Recupera un <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperty"> </xref> che incapsula un identificatore numerico specificato.
